Package ohos.agp.components

Class ScaleInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ScaleInfo

  • public class ScaleInfo
extends Object
    Stores the data of identified zooming gestures.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      double horizontalScale
      Indicates the horizontal zooming amount since the start of zooming.
      double rotation
      Indicates the rotation degree after zooming.
      double scale
      Indicates the scaling amount since the start of zooming.
      Point startPoint
      Indicates the average start point of a zooming gesture.
      Point updatePoint
      Indicates the position of an average update point on the screen during zooming.
      double verticalScale
      Indicates the vertical zooming amount since the start of zooming.
      double xVelocity
      Indicates the quantity of horizontal pixels moved every second right after the zooming.
      double yVelocity
      Indicates the quantity of vertical pixels moved every second right after the zooming.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ScaleInfo​(Point startPoint, Point updatePoint, double scale, double horizontalScale, double verticalScale, double rotation, double xVelocity, double yVelocity)
      Provides information about zooming gestures.

    • Field Detail

      • horizontalScale

        public final double horizontalScale
        Indicates the horizontal zooming amount since the start of zooming.

      • rotation

        public final double rotation
        Indicates the rotation degree after zooming.

      • scale

        public final double scale
        Indicates the scaling amount since the start of zooming.

      • startPoint

        public final Point startPoint
        Indicates the average start point of a zooming gesture.

        It records two or more start points of zooming gestures on the screen.

      • updatePoint

        public final Point updatePoint
        Indicates the position of an average update point on the screen during zooming.

        It represents the current position of the average update point.

      • verticalScale

        public final double verticalScale
        Indicates the vertical zooming amount since the start of zooming.

      • xVelocity

        public final double xVelocity
        Indicates the quantity of horizontal pixels moved every second right after the zooming.

      • yVelocity

        public final double yVelocity
        Indicates the quantity of vertical pixels moved every second right after the zooming.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScaleInfo

        public ScaleInfo​(Point startPoint,
                 Point updatePoint,
                 double scale,
                 double horizontalScale,
                 double verticalScale,
                 double rotation,
                 double xVelocity,
                 double yVelocity)
        Provides information about zooming gestures.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - Indicates the midpoint between the two fingers when the zooming gesture starts.
        updatePoint - Indicates the midpoint between the two fingers during zooming.
        scale - Indicates the gesture zooming multiple.
        horizontalScale - Indicates the horizontal zooming multiple.
        verticalScale - Indicates the vertical zooming multiple.
        rotation - Indicates the rotation angle.
        xVelocity - Indicates the X-axis velocity, in unit of pixels per second.
        yVelocity - Indicates the Y-axis velocity, in unit of pixels per second.
